name: Jinnie
greetingText: I'm sorry I couldn't choose the right birthday gift for you
wishText: But I have a small surprise, and I hope you like it ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to the one who fills my days with sunshine and my heart with love :D
text2: We've been together for almost 2 years. It's been quitea journey, hasn't it?
text3: We've been through many ups and downs during that time. And it has taught both of us a lot, enabling us to better harmonize with each other.
